title: 10 Herbs Blend - Natural Energy and Mood Booster | Spice Pilgrim
description: Experience the full-bodied blend of 10 Herbs from Spice Pilgrim. Packed with vitamins and minerals, this blend boosts your energy and mood. Made with all-natural ingredients like Peppermint, Hibiscus, Ginger, Lemongrass, Chamomile, Lemon Peel, Rose Hip, Orange Peel, Juniper Berry, and Goji Berry. Perfect for any time of the day, served hot or iced. Shop now for a natural energy and mood booster!
cleaned_text: 10 Herbs Blend Sale Sold out Regular price $14.99 USD Regular priceUnit price per Sale price $14.99 USD This full-bodied blend of 10 Herbs and berries is packed width vitamins and minerals to boost your energy and mood. Made with all-natural ingredients, this blissful blend is perfect at any time. Serve it hot or over ice for a tasty cooling sensation. It's the perfect way to start and end your day - with natural ingredients that are sure to make you feel great. Flavor Profile Cooling, peppery and citrusy, with floral hints and a gentle sweetness. Brewing Suggestion: - 1 tsp per 8 fl. oz. - 200° F - 3 min - 1 steep
